title: Healer - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Drama CD   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests
author: Lemon Yuyan   Ning Meng Xi Yan   柠檬羽嫣
description: Professor of Medicine with Gao Leng Poison Tongue × Rare Disease Gene Carrier Warm and cute, cured, dedicated, and guarding her. She thought her life had already been seen at a glance, but he gave her a romantic and grand future. 'You clearly know that I have no future to speak of...' 'Su Wei'an, you don't need a future, because I am your future.' What he wanted was not the joy of passing by, but the ability to stand together through the storm.>
